net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.richtext

Class AbstractClickFeatureBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.richtext.AbstractFeatureBehavior
      • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.richtext.AbstractClickFeatureBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.ClickHandler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, AttributeReadEnabled, AttributeReadVisible, AttributeWriteEnabled, AttributeWriteVisible, FeatureBehavior
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractColorFeatureBehavior, AbstractSelectionFeatureBehavior, AbstractSimpleClickFeatureBehavior, FeatureBehaviorInsertImage, FeatureBehaviorInsertLink

    abstract class AbstractClickFeatureBehavior
extends AbstractFeatureBehavior
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.ClickHandler
    The abstract base implementation of a FeatureBehavior for a feature that is clicked as a regular Button.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
